price: 13 où il n’y aura pour eux ni mort pour les délivrer, ni vie véritable.
arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: thumma lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā
